Stanford Recreation and Wellness
Igniting a Culture of Belonging and Well-Being
Stanford Recreation and Wellness has committed to providing a welcoming, inclusive, and inspiring space for the students, staff, faculty, and affiliates of Stanford University since 2006.
Read more about us!















Main content start



 

 
Announcements
Aquatics
Avery Aquatic Center
The Locker Rooms at the Avery Aquatic Center are closed. Restrooms are available upstairs and there is a tent for changing. We highly encourage members to come ready to swim. The anticipated reopening is Friday, September 1.
Avery Recreation Pool
With recent storms, the Avery Rec Pool project at AOERC is taking slightly longer than anticipated. We plan to reopen the pool in the mid-late Spring Quarter of 2023. Learn more | See lane availability (not available during closure)





 




 










 






Rec and Well on the go!
Download our app to receive push notifications for program registration, facility closures, and more!
Download our App

Facility Hours
View Facility Hours






 

 
Announcements





 





Play
Camp Cardinal Summer Camps
Our Classic Camp Cardinal in-person sports camps are returning this summer! Your camper will build skills and confidence that lead to a lifetime of physical activity and wellness, and in the afternoons have the option for sports or swimming – the choice is yours!
Learn more and register








Belong
Spring Catalog
Learn more about our Spring offerings with the Spring 2023 Catalog.
Learn more







 

 
Keeping Stanford Safe
Face coverings are no longer required but continue to be strongly recommended on-site, regardless of vaccination status.
The one-time COVID Facility Access Waiver need to be completed before entering the AOERC, ACSR, and SRWC for the first time.
